data.text: @LordAshcroft @IsabelOakeshott are there any probably-not-true stories about pigs' heads in this one?
@LordAshcroft @IsabelOakeshott Marketing brochure to carve it up.
@LordAshcroft @IsabelOakeshott Manual for undermining and selling off the NHS, just guessing
@rolandmcs @LordAshcroft @IsabelOakeshott And how much tax do they both pay compared to normal plebs like ourselves to the UK ?
@LordAshcroft @IsabelOakeshott Out of interest, when did you last see your NHS GP?
@LordAshcroft When do we get to clap for tax-dodging billionaires like yourself? Or do you just want us to get on our knees?
I am donating all authors' royalties from #LifeSupport to charities supporting the #NHS
